attributes.action: put more money into mental health services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
saddly when you are out in the community and you have long time mental health problems the local services do not want to know you  .
 there are 80 % of mental health people out in the community that do not have a care program  that should have andthey should have services as well.
of the 20% of people that have mental health problems there are 15% that are drug and acahole related and 5% that have just mental health problems I find it funny that the drug and acahole has been cut to nothing in my area.
 there are no more real dropin  centre as they are just get you there then get you out services and all sewrvices go though the socail services and the mental health hospital trusts were they should go though the gp at all times
 as the hospital and socail services do not really know the cleint like the gp does
